hadiths.text: Anas (Allah be pleased with him) reported that 'Ali (Allah be pleased with him) came from the Yemen, and the Apostle (ﷺ) said:With (what intention) have you put on Ihram? He said: I have put on Ibram in accordance with the intention with which Allah's Apostle (ﷺ) has put on Ibram, whereupon he (the Holy Prophet) said: Had there not been the sacrificial animals with me, I would have put off Ihram (after performing 'Umra)

chapter.ara-name: باب إِهْلاَلِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم وَهَدْيِهِ
chapter.eng-name: The Ihram and Hadi of the Prophet (ﷺ)
